content.content: 1. The following forms available on the internet at the Ontario Court Forms website are prescribed for the purposes indicated below: 1. Form 1, titled “Certificate of Lien” (a certificate of lien for the purposes of subsection 1 (1) of the Act), dated November 3, 2021. 2. Form 2, titled “Certificate of Discharge” (a certificate of discharge for the purposes of subsection 7 (1) of the Act), dated November 3, 2021.
content.raw_html:
1. The following forms available on the internet at the Ontario Court Forms website are prescribed for the purposes indicated below:

1. Form 1, titled “Certificate of Lien” (a certificate of lien for the purposes of subsection 1 (1) of the Act), dated November 3, 2021.

2. Form 2, titled “Certificate of Discharge” (a certificate of discharge for the purposes of subsection 7 (1) of the Act), dated November 3, 2021.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).   Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
